description: Manage ZFS boot environments on FreeBSD/Solaris/illumos systems.

force.description: Specifies if the unmount should be forced.

state.description: Create or delete ZFS boot environment.

snapshot.description: If specified, the new boot environment will be cloned from the given snapshot or inactive boot environment.

mountpoint.description: Path where to mount the ZFS boot environment

options.description: Create the datasets for new BE with specific ZFS properties. Multiple options can be specified. This option is available only on Solarish platforms.

description.description: Associate a description with a new boot environment. This option is available only on Solarish platforms.
